channel.title: [PI] Client won't open
channel.description:
Hey.
I need to help with client. When I open my client it just say "Error: Could not find main class GUI" I don't really know what I have to do to get it working. I tried to edit run.bat, but it gets always the same error?
@echo off title Serenex - Loading color 0a
:start echo. echo ------------------------------------------------ echo Serenex (x64), Starting up... echo ------------------------------------------------ if exist "%HOMEDRIVE%\Program Files (x86)" goto x64 goto x86
:x64 title Serenex (x64) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo.
cd ./Class/ "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit
:x86 title Serenex (x86) - Loader echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w . echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo.
cd ./Class/ "%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 exit
That's my client run.bat now and it was this same earlier before it stopped working. Could someone please help? :)
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Client won't open
item.dc:creator: @Islaynoobs Islaynoobs
item.description:
@Islaynoobs wrote:

[quote=“Kristen1234, post:2, topic:534688”]KK do you still got your source? if yes go to that where is gui and put a new gui into there…

And right click and edit for client and then put your java there.[/quote]

Yes I got that source.

And what you even mean? I’ve tried it but it won’t open that client.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Client won't open

item.description:
@Kristen1234 wrote:

KK do you still got your source? if yes go to that where is gui and put a new gui into there…

And right click and edit for client and then put your java there.

item.title: [PI] Client won't open
item.dc:creator: @Islaynoobs Islaynoobs
item.description:
@Islaynoobs wrote:

Hey.

I need to help with client.
When I open my client it just say “Error: Could not find main class GUI” I don’t really know what I have to do to get it working.
I tried to edit run.bat, but it gets always the same error?

@echo off
title Serenex - Loading
color 0a

:start
echo.
echo ------------------------------------------------
echo Serenex (x64), Starting up…
echo ------------------------------------------------
if exist “%HOMEDRIVE%\Program Files (x86)” goto x64
goto x86

:x64
title Serenex (x64) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 64-bit (x64) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.

cd ./Class/
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32
exit

:x86
title Serenex (x86) - Loader
echo Auto-Detected 32-bit (x86) System
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo . C l i e n t o u t p u t b e l o w .
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo.

cd ./Class/
"%HOMEDRIVE%/Program Files (x86)/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx1000m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32
exit

That’s my client run.bat now and it was this same earlier before it stopped working.
Could someone please help?

Thanks.

Read full topic
